item.title: Jennifer add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "There was a boy called Eustace Clarence Scrubb, and he almost deserved it." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Speaking personally, you can have my gun, but you'll take my book when you pry my cold, dead fingers off of the binding." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you liked being a teenager, there's something really wrong with you." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"I do not aim with my hand; he who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I aim with my eye.
I do not shoot with my hand; he who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I shoot with my mind.
I do not kill with my gun; he who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father. I kill with my heart." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are a uniquely portable magic." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "In many cases when a reader puts a story aside because it 'got boring,' the boredom arose because the writer grew enchanted with his powers of description and lost sight of his priority, which is to keep the ball rolling." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Do any of us, except in our dreams, truly expect to be reunited with our hearts' deepest loves, even when they leave us only for minutes, and on the most mundane of errands? No, not at all. Each time they go from our sight we in our secret hearts count them as dead. Having been given so much, we reason, how could we expect not to be brought as low as Lucifer for the staggering presumption of our love?" -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Some birds are not meant to be caged, that's all. Their feathers are too bright, their songs too sweet and wild. So you let them go, or when you open the cage to feed them they somehow fly out past you. And the part of you that knows it was wrong to imprison them in the first place rejoices, but still, the place where you live is that much more drab and empty for their departure." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fiction is the truth inside the lie." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Alone. Yes, that's the key word, the most awful word in the English tongue. Murder doesn't hold a candle to it and hell is only a poor synonym." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "That wasn't any act of God. That was an act of pure human fuckery." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Humor is almost always anger with its make-up on." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "There are books full of great writing that don't have very good stories. Read sometimes for the story... don't be like the book-snobs who won't do that. Read sometimes for the words--the language. Don't be like the play-it-safers who won't do that. But when you find a book that has both a good story and good words, treasure that book." -- Stephen King

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Any word you have to hunt for in a thesaurus is the wrong word. There are no exceptions to this rule." -- Stephen King
